channel.title: Another quick question!
channel.description:
Just another quick question:
I was wondering if anybody could tell me how to slow down the rate of fire for my mage shortbows and crystal bows? They hit really fast hard and it's a little unfair if somebody is using melee or mage. Please and thanks!

item.title: Another quick question!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

[quote=“Randomhero, post:5, topic:93794”]Oh OK OK OK. I see it says “PkingDelay = 5;” I would change the “5” to something lower to make it shoot faster? Or am I, like, going in like the complete opposite direction? And another thing: I wasn’t looking to fix anything for mage so don’t worry about it

EDIT: Okay I got it. Thanks killermage3. I appreciate your help![/quote]

Ya you have to make it lower for slow hitting, and higher for faster hitting, but to make it hit like not over 24, which the bow I know it hits like freaking 50’s idk how to lower it down, and no problem glad I could help.

Read full topic

item.title: Another quick question!
item.dc:creator: @Randomhero Randomhero
item.description:
@Randomhero wrote:

Oh OK OK OK. I see it says “PkingDelay = 5;” I would change the “5” to something lower to make it shoot faster? Or am I, like, going in like the complete opposite direction? And another thing: I wasn’t looking to fix anything for mage so don’t worry about it

EDIT: Okay I got it. Thanks killermage3. I appreciate your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Another quick question!
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

search for the item id, and you should something like “pk=20” or something like that I will modify and make more accurate. But just like change the number and to a lower or higher. For mage I don’t know what to do there.

Read full topic

item.title: Another quick question!
item.dc:creator: @Randomhero Randomhero
item.description:
@Randomhero wrote:

I’d really rather not. I worked hard on this one and I was testing a few things out and I realized that mage and crystal bows shoot way too fast. There’s certainly a solution somewhere.

Read full topic
